records.name: Barbarian
records.description: A ferocious warrior who uses fury and instinct to bring down foes.

records.name: Bard
records.description: A performer whose music works magic-- a wanderer, a tale-teller, and a jack-of-all trades.

records.name: Cleric
records.description: Master of divine magic, and a capable warrior as well.

records.name: Druid
records.description: One who draws energy from the natural world to cast divine spells and gain strange magical powers.

records.name: Fighter
records.description: A warrior with exeptional combat capability and unequaled skill with weapons.

records.name: Monk
records.description: A martial artist whos unarmed strikes hit fast and hard-- master of exotic powers.

records.name: Paladin
records.description: A champion of justice and destroyer of evil, protected and strengthened by an array of divine powers.

records.name: Ranger
records.description: A cunning, skilled warrior of the wilderness.

records.name: Rogue
records.description: A tricky, skillful scout and spy who wins the battle by stealth rather than brute force.

records.name: Sorcerer
records.description: A spellcaster with inborn magical ability.

records.name: Wizard
records.description: A potent spellcaster schooled in the arcane arts.
